title: Copilot Instructions for CVrisk
text: CVrisk R package calculating various cardiovascular disease risk scores. package implements multiple risk assessment models including: - Framingham 2008 10-year ASCVD risk (lipid labs BMI variants) - ACC/AHA 2013 10-year ASCVD risk - MESA 2015 10-year ASCVD risk (traditional risk factors coronary artery calcium variants)

title: Copilot Instructions for CVrisk
text: R/ - Main R source code files implementing risk calculation functions man/ - R documentation files (auto-generated roxygen2) tests/testthat/ - Test files using testthat framework data/ - Package data files data-raw/ - Raw data scripts data preparation docs/ - Package documentation website

title: Copilot Instructions for CVrisk
text: project follows standard R package development conventions: - Use roxygen2 function documentation (see @param, @return, @examples tags) - Export public functions @export - Follow R package structure defined DESCRIPTION NAMESPACE files - Use semantic versioning (current version DESCRIPTION file)

title: Copilot Instructions for CVrisk
text: Use descriptive variable names (e.g., age, totchol, sbp) Function names use snake_case (e.g., ascvd_10y_accaha, compute_CVrisk) Include comprehensive parameter validation functions Return NA invalid inputs --range values age - patient age years gender - “male” “female” race - “white”, “aa” (African American), “” sbp - systolic blood pressure mm Hg totchol - total cholesterol hdl - HDL cholesterol bmi - Body mass index kg/m² bp_med - blood pressure medication status (0/1 FALSE/TRUE) smoker - smoking status (0/1 FALSE/TRUE) diabetes - diabetes status (0/1 FALSE/TRUE)

title: Compute Risk Scores for Cardiovascular Diseases
text: Framingham 2008 10-year ASCVD risk (model lipid labs) Framingham 2008 10-year ASCVD risk (model BMI) ACC/AHA 2013 10-year ASCVD risk MESA 2015 10-year ASCVD risk (traditional risk factors) MESA 2015 10-year ASCVD risk (using coronary artery calcium) AHA PREVENT 2023 10-year ASCVD risk (base model) - New!

title: Compute Risk Scores for Cardiovascular Diseases
code: # Install from CRAN install.packages("CVrisk")  # Install the development version from GitHub: # install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("vcastro/CVrisk")

title: Compute Risk Scores for Cardiovascular Diseases
text: Calculate single score: Calculate multiple scores dataframe append scores dataframe:
code: library(CVrisk) ascvd_10y_accaha(race = "aa", gender = "male", age = 55,     totchol = 213, hdl = 50, sbp = 140,     bp_med = FALSE, smoker=0, diabetes=0)  # Calculate PREVENT risk score (requires additional parameters) ascvd_10y_prevent(gender = "female", age = 50, sbp = 160, bp_med = 1,    totchol = 200, hdl = 45, statin = 0, diabetes = 1, smoker = 0,    egfr = 90, bmi = 35) # Compute traditional risk scores compute_CVrisk(sample_data,    age = "age", race = "race", gender = "gender", bmi = "BMI", sbp = "sbp",    hdl = "hdl", totchol = "totchol", bp_med = "bp_med", smoker = "smoker",    diabetes = "diabetes", lipid_med = "lipid_med",    fh_heartattack = "fh_heartattack", cac = "cac" )  # To include PREVENT score, specify scores explicitly and provide egfr compute_CVrisk(my_data,    scores = c("ascvd_10y_accaha", "ascvd_10y_prevent"),    age = "age", gender = "gender", sbp = "sbp",     hdl = "hdl", totchol = "totchol", bmi = "BMI",    bp_med = "bp_med", diabetes = "diabetes", smoker = "smoker",    statin = "lipid_med", egfr = "egfr" )
